issue.title: Accessibility issue: Page requires horizontal scrolling at 320x256 viewport on /partners/service-channel-partners%20
Accessibility issue: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination on /

findings.problemShort: landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination
findings.solutionShort: ensure landmarks are unique
findings.solutionLong:
Fix any of the following:
  The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable

issue.title: Accessibility issue: <html> element must have a lang attribute on /product/getting-started/foundations/layout/%20

findings.problemShort: <html> element must have a lang attribute
findings.solutionShort: ensure every html document has a lang attribute
findings.solutionLong:
Fix any of the following:
  The <html> element does not have a lang attribute

issue.title: Accessibility issue: Document should have one main landmark on /product/getting-started/foundations/layout/%20

findings.problemShort: document should have one main landmark
findings.solutionShort: ensure the document has a main landmark
findings.solutionLong:
Fix all of the following:
  Document does not have a main landmark

issue.title: Accessibility issue: All page content should be contained by landmarks on /product/getting-started/foundations/layout/%20

findings.html:
Server Error in '/' Application.

The resource cannot be found.
findings.problemShort: all page content should be contained by landmarks
findings.solutionShort: ensure all page content is contained by landmarks
findings.solutionLong:
Fix any of the following:
  Some page content is not contained by landmarks

issue.title: Accessibility issue: Required aria attributes must be provided on /react/storybook/

findings.problemShort: required aria attributes must be provided
findings.solutionShort: ensure elements with aria roles have all required aria attributes
findings.solutionLong:
Fix any of the following:
  Required ARIA attribute not present: aria-checked

issue.title: Accessibility issue: Scrollable region must have keyboard access on /react/storybook/
Accessibility issue: The skip-link target should exist and be focusable on /react/storybook/

findings.html: Skip to sidebar
findings.problemShort: the skip-link target should exist and be focusable
findings.solutionShort: ensure all skip links have a focusable target
findings.solutionLong:
Fix any of the following:
  No skip link target

issue.title: Accessibility issue: Page should contain a level-one heading on /request/landing%20

findings.solutionShort: ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading

issue.title: Accessibility issue: Page requires horizontal scrolling at 320x256 viewport on /partners/service-channel-partners%20

findings.problemShort: page requires horizontal scrolling at 320x256 viewport
findings.solutionShort: ensure content is responsive and does not require horizontal scrolling at small viewport sizes
findings.solutionLong: The page has a scroll width of 940px but a client width of only 320px at 320x256 viewport, requiring horizontal scrolling. This violates WCAG 2.1 Level AA Success Criterion 1.4.10 (Reflow).
